txt.en:
[placeholder],

Books! Who needs 'em? A good Brawler, that's who! Don't you want to refine your techniques? Return to me in the Bree Jail and I'll help you with your studies.

That's right, I said studies! If you want to be the second-best Brawler in all the land (after me, of course), you'll have some reading to do!

Brom Hawksbeard

'The fine art of brawling isn't just about punching the other fellow, you know: you need to know how hard to hit him, and where!\n\n'These books should help you, as they helped me. And I'll sell them to you for a very nice discount!'
You received a letter from Brom Hawksbeard, the Brawler trainer in Bree-town, asking to see you.
Bring the letter to Brom Hawksbeard in Bree Jail
Brom Hawksbeard sent you a letter requesting that you visit him in the Bree Jail.\n\nDeliver the letter to Brom. He can be found in the Bree Jail.
